name: 高級寫作（二）
restrict: ◎必須先修過【ENU0287  中級寫作（一）】、【ENU0288  中級寫作（二）】、【ENU0289  高級寫作（一）】
description: 在「高級寫作」中，該課程旨在將學生在前兩年學到的寫作技巧，與他們對某個主題、學科或主題的知識相結合，以便為學生未來的職業生涯做好準備。本課程將使用不同類型、富有創意的文體，在不同領域進行情境化的寫作，內容可能包括與考試相關、與工作相關、或與研究論文相關的主題。以文字為主的寫作，也可能搭配其他的傳播管道，例如圖片、音頻、或個人/小組網頁等來進行。
goals: To help students rehearse skills in various modes of writing
Help students build a good sense of the difference between smart, sophisticated, quality writing and bland, hackneyed writing
Students are expected to integrate writing techniques with their knowledge of the topic/subject
syllabus:
**Course description**

This course is to help students develop their knowledge of particular writing genres and apply it to real-world situations. They will be particularly taught to (1) analyze photos, (2) create a travel brochure, and (3) make a proposal. In addition, they will learn to build up their writing style through some online editing tools. It is intended that students can hone their writing skills and techniques through lectures, hands-on practices, writing drafts, peer review, individual conferencing with the professor, and major revisions.

For details, please check out the [syllabus](https://ap.itc.ntnu.edu.tw/NtnuFileShare/file.do?action=dl&gno=2ed2ed7bf7f440119e84fcd29135268e&fno=57aab91665d74268b8979591cf38ca15).

grading.note: Reflections on writing style and online editing tools
